instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a medium casserole dish.
instructions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add noodles, cook for 6 to 8 minutes, until al dente, and drain.
instructions.3: Place turkey in a skillet over medium heat, and cook until evenly brown. Drain grease.
instructions.4: In a bowl, gently mix cooked noodles and turkey, corn, and soup. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer to the prepared baking dish.
instructions.5: Bake 20 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly.

Is noodles from Step 2 still available in Step 4?
